headline: Northrop Grumman to Participate in the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., Nov. 05, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE: NOC) will participate in the Baird 2025 Global Industrial Conference on Wednesday, November 12. Kathy Warden, chair, chief executive officer and president will present beginning at 9:30 a.m. Eastern time. The presentation will be webcast live at http://investor.northropgrumman.com.
